title: That one type foundry website
content:
I stumbled across a fantastic website the other day and can't seem to remember what it was.

It features (among many other things) info on the type designed by Norm (Manuel Krebs and Dimitri Bruni) for the airport in ?Berlin? i think.. typeface called simple? My mind may be failing me.

The site was really modular in that the navigation could be dragged around the screen.

Anyone?

Thanks.
author: evanmacdonald

comments.content: Simple was used by Intégral Ruedi Baur for the signage system of the Köln-Bonn airport.
